front.title: The Requirements for Secure Routing Path

abstract.t: Both ISPs and users have put forward requirements for secure routing, the scenarios are analyzed in the draft draft-chen-secure-routing- use-cases (https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/draft-chen-secure- routing-use-cases/). This draft analyzes the functions required to implement secure routing. Attack detection and users security requirements translateion are out of scope.
